description: React component for a contact form allowing users to submit inquiries, with local state management and simulated submission handling.

methods.name: ContactForm
methods.description: React functional component rendering a contact form with state for form fields and submission status.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input change events, updating form state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, simulating a network response.
